FuncDef: The display bgp ipv6 unnumbered peer command displays information about BGP IPv6 unnumbered peers. The display bgp ipv6 unnumbered peer command displays information about BGP IPv6 unnumbered peers. This command is supported only on the CE6863H, CE6863H-K, CE6860-SAN, CE6866K, CE6866, CE6860-HAM, CE6855-48XS8CQ, CE6885-SAN, CE8850-SAN, CE8855, CE8851-32CQ4BQ, CE8851K, CE8851-32CQ8DQ-P, CE8850-HAM, CE6881H, CE6881H-K, CE6820H, CE6820H-K, CE6820S, CE6885, CE6885-T, CE6885-LL (standard forwarding mode) and CE6863E-48S8CQ.
ExtraInfo: To check information about BGP IPv6 unnumbered peers, run the display bgp ipv6 unnumbered peer command.
